general.gigTitle: build, design website, redesign, customize, revamp wordpress website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: I'm a Web designer and Developer with SEO optimizer
sellerCard.description:
Hi Fiverr Community, I'm a professional web designer and developer. I've more than 06 years of extensive experience in WordPress website development. I've worked on more than 600+ websites all over the world. if you search for a professional WordPress developer, yes you are on the right track.
NOT in the effort. I am highly organized and driven by deadlines. So, why are you waiting? Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions
I will provide the following things:

modern and professional website according to your business needs

description.content:
About this gig


Hi Fiverr community, I'm Ferdausi, I'm doing WordPress website design or development and customization for the last 6 years.


Also, If you're looking for experience person to develop your WordPress website for your company, business, then you are at right place!


  

What type of WordPress site I can develop:


Personal Blogs

Landing page

Portfolio

Magazine

eCommerce website

Real Estate

Doctors Appointment

Hotel Booking 

School/College/University, Learning Management System (LMS)

Travel & Tours, Wedding, Health & Fitness, Spa, Sports

Newsletter/popup/Contact Form

WordPress Divi and Elementor website design

Clone, Transfer, Move, Duplicate, Backup, Migration


Multi-Language Site:


Personal Blog

E-commerce

Service site

Company/Business

Portfolio

 

Main Features of WordPress site:


Premium theme and plugins

Fully Responsive

SEO optimized

Mobile friendly

pixel-perfect WordPress

 

Why you should Choose me :


100% Satisfaction Guarantee (Until you are satisfied)

Video Instruction for Modifying/Editing

Free Support for 30 Days After Completion

 

Are you ready to place order? Please contact me before for better understandings and discussion with me. Thanks

packageList.title: Basic/ Landing page/ 1 page Design
packageList.description: I'll create or design a landing page website with an eye-catching view.

packageList.title: Standard/ 6 Pages Website Design
packageList.description: I'll build a 6 pages website with any functionality and user friendly

packageList.title: Premium/ 6 to 12 pages Website
packageList.description: I'll build a 6 to up to 12 pages website with any functionality and user friendly

openGraph.title: build, design website, redesign, customize, revamp wordpress website development

reviews.comment: I am very happy with her work. He consistently impresses me with his creativity and delivers exactly what I need no extra modifications. I simply provide a topic, and she turns it into a dream website. Her talent and efficiency make him an outstanding web developer! I'll hire him again and again.
He has done a Wonderful job on my website. He is professional, fast, and delivered exactly what I needed with great attention to detail. Highly recommend their services!

seller_response.comment: Wonderful experiences with him. he is a great buyer.

reviews.comment: Wow great Job! Delivered quickly, and exactly as I envisioned. The service was professional, efficient, and hassle-free. Highly recommended service! Thank you very much.

seller_response.comment: Great buyer and Outstanding Experience with him.

reviews.comment: She did Excellent work, promptly done. Very pleased, that Ferdausi's work is intuitive, and his understanding of my instructions is perfect. Especially good at Responsive. Professional and friendly. Great result.
Great to work with him. Provided good Design and fixed my website footer issues. Worked quickly.
